title: stringer does not implement GO15EXPERIMENT=1
body:
we have a project set up using the new vendoring stuff.
we have a source file that imports (say) "github.com/Sirupsen/logrus"
which has been put at the relevent spot. running
go build
works successfully. however running
stringer -type ProcesStatus .
fails complaining it can't find that package:
stringer: checking package: horde.go:6:2: could not import github.com/Sirupsen/logrus (can't find import: github.com/Sirupsen/logrus)
